pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solve the Empirical Bayes Normal Means Problem // Provides simple, fast, and stable functions to fit the normal means model using empirical Bayes. For available models and details, see function ebnm(). Our JSS article, Willwerscheid, Carbonetto, and Stephens (2025) doi:10.18637/jss.v114.i03, provides a detailed introduction to the package.
